animeTitle: Tensei shitara Slime Datta Ken Movie: Guren no Kizuna-hen
otherNames: TenSura, That Time I Got Reincarnated as a Slime Movie; 劇場版 転生したらスライムだった件 紅蓮の絆編
synopsis: In Raja, a small country located to the west of Tempest. Rimuru and his companions get involved in a long-running conspiracy that swirls around the mysterious power of the queen. Rimuru and his commander Benimaru also encounter another ogre survivor named Hiiro, a man that used to be the brother of Benimaru.
